Title: Power Rangers
Writer: John Gatins (screenplay by), Matt Sazama (story by), Burk Sharpless (story by), Michele Mulroney (story by), Kieran Mulroney (story by), Haim Saban (based upon "Power Rangers" created by), Saburo Yatsude (television series: "Super Sentai"), Shotaro Ishinomori (television series: "Super Sentai")
Actors: Dacre Montgomery, Naomi Scott, RJ Cyler, Ludi Lin
Plot: High school outcasts stumble upon an old alien ship, where they acquire superpowers and are dubbed the Power Rangers. Learning that an old enemy of the previous generation has returned to exact vegenance, the group must harness their powers and use them to work together and save the world.
Country: USA, Hong Kong, Japan, Mexico, Canada, New Zealand
